thread.title: SendGrid to Announce Q1 2018 Financial Results on May 1

author: cnbc.com
title: SendGrid to Announce Q1 2018 Financial Results on May 1
text:
DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- SendGrid, Inc. (NYSE: SEND), a leading digital communication platform that drives engagement and growth, today announced that it will report its financial results for first quarter ended March 31, 2018 after market close on Tuesday, May 1, 2018. SendGrid and live webcast to discuss the results.
The conference call will begin at 3 p.m. Mountain Time (5 p.m. Eastern Time) on Tuesday May 1, 2018. The conference call can be accessed by dialing (844) 842-1230 from the United States or (647) 253-8797 internationally with conference ID 6734919. In addition, a live webcast and replay of the conference call can be accessed from the Investor Relations page of SendGridâ€™s website at https://investors.sendgrid.com . Following the completion of the call through 11:59 pm Eastern Time on May 8, 2018, a telephone replay will be available by dialing (800) 585-8367 from the United States or (416) 621-4642 internationally with conference ID 6734919. SendGrid has used, and intends to continue to use, its Investor Relations website as a means of disclosing material non-public information and for complying with its disclosure obligations under Regulation FD.
About SendGrid
SendGrid is a leading digital communication platform, enabling businesses to engage with their customers via email reliably, effectively and at scale. A leader in email deliverability, SendGrid has processed over 40 billion emails each month for internet and mobile-based customers as well as more traditional enterprises.
Source: SendGrid, Inc.
